title: Presence
content:
Features, beings , and locations can have presence value. This is indicated by a value in a purple box in the upper-right corner of the card's title bar.

  • When a card Fatigues you, if the card is ready, you suffer fatigue equal to the presence of that card. If it is exhausted, the card does not fatigue you.
  • Several of the common tests scale their difficulty off of the presence of the card with which they're interacting.
